The Mount is a small campus and there is approximately three to four security guards on duty. There are call boxes all around campus and in parking lots in case of emergencies, and if you ever have car problems you can call security and they will help you out. All the officers are very nice and helpful.
There are always posters and signs for different activities and clubs that are starting up or continuing.
If you are a student who likes a small town, one on one attention, and a staff and other students who treat you like family then this is the college for you!

Mount Aloysius is a catholic college, therefore they are very religion based. All facilities are newer and updated with special study areas that are comfy and quiet. Every student is required to take a Cultural Literacy Seminar (CLS) class that requires students to go to convocations and meet new people, like a field trip.

There is a lot of open space at the Mount to go outside and have a catch with your friends or play pick up games at the different athletic complexes. Also the city of Altoona is about fifteen minutes away and has a lot more entertainment as far as restaurants, ice skating rink, bowling alleys, and much more.
The food was very good and there was a big variety. There was also a snack shack that you could use your meal plan at.
There are four dorms at the Mount and two of them are very new and updated. The other two dorms are older and show their age.

The instructors made sure you knew what you where learning about and strive to make you learn as much as possible. Classes where not necessarily hard just a lot of work and required a lot of knowledge.

The Mount is a small college where you can find a lot of one on one attention. The closest city with a lot of restaurants and entertainment is Altoona and it takes approximately fifteen minutes to get there.
Mount Aloysius College had a great cafeteria with good food and a wide variety. Most instructor at the Mount were always very nice and helpful. They have a beautiful campus that is small and homey

textAfterTable: Clubs and activities have a wide range. Almost every interest can be found on campus. Whether it be sports, art, politics, religion, or majors, Mount Aloysius has a club for that! Great for these types of students If you like genuine people, professors who want to help you succeed, and a tight knit community of friends, I would say look into Mount Aloysius College! Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus Mount Aloysius is a Catholic college, yet allows a diversity of people to attend. Bang for the buck Mount Aloysius is a private institution with some of the lowest tuition rates. Almost all students receive financial aid help. They offer a multitude of scholarships. What to do for fun Mount Aloysius College offers many clubs and sports. Getting involved with groups around campus allow for more activities. Intramural basketball is a favorite! Our campus is conveniently located 15 minutes from Altoona and Ebensburg. Altoona offers a large shopping mall, places to eat, movie theaters, and bowling. Ebensburg offers eating and small shops. Food and Dining A buffet style is served 3 meals a day Monday through Friday. The weekends offer 2 meals
